text: How does the community feel about Mozilla Public License? I loosely like the idea of copy-left, but I have the impression that GPL is too restrictive and sort of poisons other stuff. Is MPL any better?

text: I thought it was copyleft itself which is "poisonous"

text: Personally, I find copyleft to be kinda obnoxious. I appreciate that MPL is less demanding than GPL, but I still just think that if I’m going to write or use open source software, I don’t want it to come with hooks or conditions. I want it to be free.
